title: Tran - narrantis ab ore viri - Ovid Heroides 1

content.question: In the sentence, narrantis coniunx pendet ab ore viri is translated

choices.label: the wife, waiting for her husband, hangs on his words
the husband hangs on the words of his wife telling a story
the wife hangs on the words of her husband telling a story
the husband tells a story with his wife hanging on his words

content.answer: the wife hangs on the words of her husband telling a story
